thread.title: Global Investors Cautious Ahead of U.S. Inflation Reading

author: Kenan Machado
title: Global Investors Cautious Ahead of U.S. Inflation Reading
text:
U.S. inflation data in focus Indexes turn lower midday Trading calm in Europe, Asia-Pacific U.S. stocks fell Tuesday, erasing earlier gains, pulled down by a selloff in tech shares.
At 4 p.m. ET, the Dow Jones Industrial Average declined 172 points, or 0.7%, to 25007. The S&P 500 slid 0.6%, and the tech-heavy Nasdaq Composite dropped 1%.
Tech...
